events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but it does not fit at all. I want to return it and get a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's request involves returning a product and processing a refund for a purchase.
Support agent has been assigned to handle the customer's refund request regarding the jacket return.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you want to return the jacket and receive a refund. I'm here to assist you with this.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in its original packaging to start the refund process?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The jacket is still unused and kept in its original packaging, ready for return.
Thank you for the details. Please ship the jacket back to our return center using the prepaid label we will email you shortly. Once received, we will process your refund.
That sounds good, I appreciate the quick response and clear instructions on how to return the jacket.
We have received your returned jacket in good condition and processed a full refund to your original payment method. Please allow 3-5 business days for it to appear on your account.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the refund. Please let us know if there is anything else we can assist you with.
As we have not heard further from you, we are closing this refund case. Thank you for shopping with us, and we hope to serve you again in the future.
